CmdLine: apt-get update &&   apt-get install -y software-properties-common &&   apt-get install -y apt-transport-https &&   apt-get install -y ca-certificates &&   curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/debian/gpg | apt-key add - &&   add-apt-repository -y "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/debian $(lsb_release -cs) stable" &&   apt-get update &&   apt-get install -y docker-ce &&   apt-get install -y ruby &&   apt-get install -y ivy &&   apt-get install -y make &&   apt-get install -y git &&   curl -L "https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/download/$DOCKER_COMPOSE_VERSION/docker-compose-$(uname -s)-$(uname -m)" -o $DOCKER_COMPOSE_HOME/docker-compose &&   chmod +x $DOCKER_COMPOSE_HOME/docker-compose &&   curl -L https://github.com/docker/machine/releases/download/$DOCKER_MACHINE_VERSION/docker-machine-$(uname -s)-$(uname -m) -o $DOCKER_MACHINE_HOME/docker-machine &&   chmod +x $DOCKER_MACHINE_HOME/docker-machine &&   mkdir -p $ARG_ANT_HOME_DIR $ARG_MAVEN_HOME_DIR $ARG_MAVEN_LIB_DIR $ARG_MAVEN_REPO_DIR $ARG_JENKINS_DIR/.m2 &&   curl -fsSL http://www-us.apache.org/dist//ant/binaries/apache-ant-$ANT_VERSION-bin.tar.gz | tar -xzC $ARG_ANT_HOME_DIR --strip-components=1 &&   curl -fsSL http://apache.osuosl.org/maven/maven-3/$MAVEN_VERSION/binaries/apache-maven-$MAVEN_VERSION-bin.tar.gz | tar -xzC $ARG_MAVEN_HOME_DIR --strip-components=1 &&   wget -O sonar-scanner-cli-$SONAR_SCANNER_VERSION-$SONAR_SCANNER_SYSTEM.zip  https://sonarsource.bintray.com/Distribution/sonar-scanner-cli/sonar-scanner-cli-$SONAR_SCANNER_VERSION-$SONAR_SCANNER_SYSTEM.zip &&   unzip -d /usr/share/ sonar-scanner-cli-$SONAR_SCANNER_VERSION-$SONAR_SCANNER_SYSTEM.zip &&   rm sonar-scanner-cli-$SONAR_SCANNER_VERSION-$SONAR_SCANNER_SYSTEM.zip &&   mv /usr/share/sonar-scanner-$SONAR_SCANNER_VERSION-$SONAR_SCANNER_SYSTEM $SONAR_SCANNER_HOME &&   ln -s $ARG_ANT_HOME_DIR/bin/ant /usr/bin/ant &&   ln -s $ARG_MAVEN_HOME_DIR/bin/mvn /usr/bin/mvn &&   ln -s $SONAR_SCANNER_HOME/bin/sonar-scanner /usr/bin/sonar-scanner &&   usermod -aG docker jenkins
Commands.Name: run
